label: Person-year survey dataset
description: includes survey data in person-year format, i.e., each person-year is contained in one data row

label: Zygosity dataset
description: includes data of the zygosity questionnaire on which the zygosity assessment for the twin pairs is based

label: Generated scales and residuals
description: includes generated variables and residuals on several scales, e.g. means or sumscores of item blocks
